full_summary:
# Environmental Monitoring Systems (EMS)
## Tender Notice
### Reference Information
* Reference Number: PW-22-01017272
* Solicitation Number: W6369-22-A009
* Amendment Number: 9

### Tender Details
* *Request for Proposal*: The Department of National Defence invites qualified suppliers to submit proposals for the supply of Environmental Monitoring Systems (EMS) fitted with data loggers and alarms.
* *Goods and Services Required*: The EMS must be capable of continuously and remotely monitoring the temperature of refrigerators (2oC to 8oC) and freezers (-20oC and -80oC) for the storage of COVID-19 vaccines.
* *Delivery Location*: The goods must be delivered to Central Medical Equipment Depot (CMED) in Ottawa, Ontario.
* *Estimated Quantity*: The estimated quantity of the commodity is stated under the Initial Contract and the Optional Requirement.
* *Duration of Contract*: The contract duration is from the contract award date to March 31st, 2027.
* *Delivery Timeline*: All deliverables must be received on or before August 30th, 2023, for the Initial Contract period. Optional Requirement goods and services must be delivered before March 31st, 2027.

### Trade Agreements
* The contract is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), and other trade agreements.

### Notice URL and Attachments
Please refer to the following URLs for the tender documents and attachments:
